MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L23 postcode area of Liverpool. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:52am. Our engineers are on site and confirmed there is a fault with the underground cable network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible via generator by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:50pm on 12th October 2020
